hero.title: Faster shipping, lower costs, and AI-ready bills of lading.
hero.subtitle: Control all your shipping operations from one place — compare shipping companies, choose the best for you, and generate shipping bills in seconds without any hassle.

footerCta.title: Try Ship Flow Today
footerCta.subtitle: Start managing your shipments smarter and faster than ever.

footer.aboutText: We organize all your shipping operations from one place — between shipping companies, stores, and customers — to make the process faster, more efficient, and easier to control.

steps.title: Ready bill of lading in seconds, with AI detecting your data.

aiStep1.desc: Upload the order file or enter simple data (Customer Name, City, Order Number)

aiStep3.desc: The system will fill in all shipping bill details to be ready for printing or sending to the shipping company.

pricing.title: Plans for every business size
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits your needs, whether you are a starter or a large company.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: We are proud of our clients' trust and always strive to provide the best.
testimonials.sampleText: Excellent service and high quality, happy to work on this platform and I look forward to more future cooperation.

tracking.title: Real-time tracking and accurate reports
tracking.desc: Monitor your shipment performance from any device.

prices.title: Preferential prices
prices.desc: Get prices lower than the market thanks to our partnerships.

ai.title: AI for data extraction
ai.desc: Don't waste time filling data, the system handles it.

comparison.title: Instant comparison between carriers
comparison.desc: Compare prices, time, and services in a moment.
